EmailTemplate.name: 24_09 Scheduled Maintenance Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: SFPC Scheduled Maintenance
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Salesforce.com Scheduled Maintenance Notification
Salesforce.com will be performing a scheduled maintenance on Saturday September 24th, 2005 (PST).
Please Note: You will not have access to the salesforce.com application during these times:
Theatre (City)
System Down
System Back Up
US, San Jose
8PM Saturday 24th Sept
12AM Sunday 25th Sept
Emerging & European Theatre (London)
4AM Sunday 25th Sept
8AM Sunday 25th Sept
APAC (Sydney)
1PM Sunday 25th Sept
5PM Sunday 25th Sept
APAC (Seoul)
Noon Sunday 25th Sept
4PM Sunday 25th Sep
If you experience any difficulties, please set up a case with GSTS or if your situation is URGENT, please call one of the GSTS numbers listed below:
Americas +1 408 526 8888 option 4 then 4 EMEA +31 20 485 4888 option 3 AsiaPac Local Extension X68888 (Int'l +61 2 8446 8888) option 2
Thank you.
For corporate legal information please click here: http://www.cisco.com/web/about/doing_business/legal/cri/index.html.
